### This file was generated by tests that were run on 3/18/2017 12:56:51 PM.
# Convert PowerShell to CSharp
## If, Else If, Else
### Source: PowerShell
```powershell
function Method
{
	if (1 -eq 2)
	{
	}
	elseif ("xyz" -eq (New-Object -TypeName Object))
	{
	}
	else
	{
	}
}
```
### Target: CSharp
```csharp
void Method()
{
	if (1 == 2)
	{
	}
	else if ("xyz" == (new Object()))
	{
	}
	else
	{
	}
}
```
